participant_1.background:
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
i am not a big fan of waiting in line.
i teach middle school art.
i am a recovering alcoholic.
i went to law school.

participant_2.background:
I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills.
I will not talk about my favorite food with others.
While my parents are of an older generation, my music taste is contemporary and eclectic.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.
I lie to my children about eating healthy.

content.text: Not too shabby. I just finished a long day of teaching middle school art.
I'm sorry you're having a long day, but teaching art sounds like a really cool job!
It is! I love it. I'm actually a recovering alcoholic, and being able to share my love of art with kids has really been a great way to stay sober.
That's amazing! I'm really glad you're able to find a fulfilling career that's helping you stay sober.
Thanks! I'm really grateful for it.
I'm sure your students are lucky to have you as their teacher.
I hope so! I love making a difference in their lives.
I'm sure you do. What's your favorite thing about teaching art?
I love seeing the excitement on my students' faces when they create something amazing.
That's so sweet! I can imagine it's really rewarding to see your students' creativity come to life.
It is! It's the best part of my job.
I'm sure it is! That sounds like a really great job
